memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Model< T > XModel, Forcing< float > &XForcing, Model< T > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: SetupGPU

briefdescription.para: Setup and initialize GPU for simulation.

detaileddescription.para:
This function sets up the GPU device, allocates memory, and copies data from the host to the device.
XParam
Simulation parameters
XModel
Host model data structure
XForcing
Forcing data structure
XModel_g
Device model data structure

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Model< float > XModel, Forcing< float > &XForcing, Model< float > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: SetupGPU< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param &XParam, Model< double > XModel, Forcing< float > &XForcing, Model< double > &XModel_g)
memberdef.name: SetupGPU< double >

memberdef.name: CUDA_CHECK

detaileddescription.para: Checks the CUDA error code and prints an error message if the code indicates failure.
